channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footstool flytipped on pavement, 25th October
item.description:
Large footstool left out on pavement, potentially hazardous especially for visually impaired pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 144, Croydon Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Bag of used medical items, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish bags dumped on property -27 leinster terrace, 25th October
item.description:
This is a recurring Statutory Nuisance see WCC case CAS-1505887-S1J7S9, Two new bags of household waste are on the neighbor's private doorstep, creating an immediate pest and health hazard. Cleansing is required to execute the removal order from Environmental Health.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Leinster Terrace, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly posting on traffic lights, 25th October
item.description:
Halloween event poster has been tied to the traffic lights outside Aldi. Potentially dangerous distraction for drivers at this very busy junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Croydon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car in unroadworthy condition, 25th October
item.description:
Van had been here for almost a month. Appears in poor condition- smashed window, rust, dents. Creates safety issues as difficult for neighbours to gain visibility upon exiting driveways, also given size.of vehicle difficult to cross the road .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crathie Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
